member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceCandidate
member.summary: Represents a single possible value for a given resource, and the qualifiers associated with that resource.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceCandidate.Metadata
member.summary: Gets the list of metadata name value pairs.
member.returns: A list of string pairs, each containing the name of an IndexedResourceQualifier and its value.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceCandidate.Qualifiers
member.summary: Gets the list of IndexedResourceQualifier s.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceCandidate.Type
member.summary: Gets the type property that determines whether the resource is a file or a string.
member.returns: A value from the IndexedResourceType enumeration.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceCandidate.ValueAsString
member.summary: Gets the value of the candidate as a String.
member.returns: If the candidate is a file, the value is a file path (such as "images\logo.scale-100.png") relative to the project root passed to the ResourceIndexer constructor. If the candidate is a string, the value is the actual string (such as "Hello World").

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceCandidate.GetQualifierValue(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a qualifier, given its name.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceQualifier
member.summary: Represents an object that declares under what context a resource is appropriate.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceQualifier.QualifierName
member.summary: Gets the name of the qualifier.
member.returns: The name of the qualifier, such as "language", "contrast", or "scale".

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceQualifier.QualifierValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the qualifier.
member.returns: The value of the qualifier. The case of the qualifier value should be preserved from the first instance of the qualifier discovered during indexing.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.IndexedResourceType
member.summary: Specifies whether an IndexedResourceCandidate is a file or a string.

member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.ResourceIndexer
member.summary: Indexes source resource files or containers, and generates named resource candidates using particular file and folder naming conventions.
member.deprecated: Use CreateResourceIndexer in mrmsupport.dll instead of ResourceIndexer. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.ResourceIndexer.#ctor(Windows.Foundation.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a new ResourceIndexer specifying the root of the project files.
member.deprecated: Use CreateResourceIndexer in mrmsupport.dll instead of IResourceIndexerFactory. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.ResourceIndexer.#ctor(Windows.Foundation.Uri,Windows.Foundation.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a new ResourceIndexer specifying the root of the project files and an extension DLL.
member.deprecated: Use CreateResourceIndexer in mrmsupport.dll instead of IResourceIndexerFactory2. For more info, see MSDN.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.ResourceIndexer.IndexFileContentsAsync(Windows.Foundation.Uri)
member.summary: Indexes a ResW, ResJSON, PRI, or PRI XML dump file path for file and folder naming conventions, and applies the qualifiers to the resources found within the contents of the file.
member.deprecated: Use IndexFilePath in mrmsupport.dll instead of IResourceIndexer. For more info, see MSDN.
member.param: The file to be indexed (file:// URI). The path must be an absolute path with the drive letter specified. The Uri can also provide an empty authority which is assumed to be the local file system. Long file paths are not supported.
member.returns: A list of IndexedResourceCandidate objects found within *file*. This is an empty list if nothing is found.

member.name: M:Windows.ApplicationModel.Resources.Management.ResourceIndexer.IndexFilePath(Windows.Foundation.Uri)
member.summary: Indexes a file path for file and folder naming conventions.
member.deprecated: Use IndexFilePath in mrmsupport.dll instead of IResourceIndexer. For more info, see MSDN.
member.param: The file to be indexed (file:// URI). The path must be an absolute path with the drive letter specified. The Uri can also provide an empty authority which is assumed to be the local file system. Long file paths are not supported.
member.returns: An IndexedResourceCandidate object that represents the indexed file resource.
